Enumerations.name: InternalModifier
Enumerations.summary: The name of the modifiers that are used internally by DayPicker.

Interfaces.name: CaptionProps
Interfaces.summary: Represent the props of the [Caption](/api/main/functions/Caption.md) component.

Interfaces.name: CustomComponents
Interfaces.summary: Map of the components that can be changed using the `components` prop.

Interfaces.name: DayContentProps
Interfaces.summary: Represent the props for the [DayContent](/api/main/functions/DayContent.md) component.

Interfaces.name: DayPickerBase
Interfaces.summary: The base props for the [DayPicker](/api/main/functions/DayPicker.md) component and the [DayPickerContext](/api/main/variables/DayPickerContext.md).

Interfaces.name: DayPickerContextValue
Interfaces.summary:
The value of the [DayPickerContext](/api/main/variables/DayPickerContext.md) extends the props from DayPicker
with default and cleaned up values.

Interfaces.name: DayPickerDefaultProps
Interfaces.summary: The props for the [DayPicker](/api/main/functions/DayPicker.md) component when using `mode="default"` or `undefined`.

Interfaces.name: DayPickerMultipleProps
Interfaces.summary: The props for the [DayPicker](/api/main/functions/DayPicker.md) component when using `mode="multiple"`.

Interfaces.name: DayPickerRangeProps
Interfaces.summary: The props for the [DayPicker](/api/main/functions/DayPicker.md) component when using `mode="range"`.

Interfaces.name: DayPickerSingleProps
Interfaces.summary: The props for the [DayPicker](/api/main/functions/DayPicker.md) component when using `mode="single"`.

Interfaces.name: DayProps
Interfaces.summary: Represent the props used by the [Day](/api/main/functions/Day.md) component.

Type Aliases.name: ActiveModifiers
Type Aliases.summary:
The modifiers that are matching a day in the calendar. Use the [useActiveModifiers](/api/main/functions/useActiveModifiers.md) hook to get the modifiers for a day.

```
const activeModifiers: ActiveModifiers = {
 selected: true,
 customModifier: true
}
```

Type Aliases.name: ButtonProps
Type Aliases.summary: The props for the [Button](/api/main/functions/Button.md) component.

Type Aliases.name: CaptionLayout
Type Aliases.summary:
The layout of the caption:

- `dropdown`: display dropdowns for choosing the month and the year.
- `buttons`: display previous month / next month buttons.
- `dropdown-buttons`: display both month / year dropdowns and previous month / next month buttons.

Type Aliases.name: ClassNames
Type Aliases.summary: The class names of each element.

Type Aliases.name: CustomModifiers
Type Aliases.summary:
A map of matchers used as custom modifiers by DayPicker component. This is
the same as []], but it accepts only array of [[Matcher](/api/main/type-aliases/DayModifiers.md)s.

Type Aliases.name: DateAfter
Type Aliases.summary: A matcher to match a day falling after the specified date, with the date not included.

Type Aliases.name: DateBefore
Type Aliases.summary: A matcher to match a day falling before the specified date, with the date not included.

Type Aliases.name: DateFormatter
Type Aliases.summary: Represents a function to format a date.

Type Aliases.name: DateInterval
Type Aliases.summary: A matcher to match a day falling before and/or after two dates, where the dates are not included.

Type Aliases.name: DateRange
Type Aliases.summary: A matcher to match a range of dates. The range can be open. Differently from [DateInterval](/api/main/type-aliases/DateInterval.md), the dates here are included.

Type Aliases.name: DayClickEventHandler
Type Aliases.summary: The event handler when a day is clicked.

Type Aliases.name: DayFocusEventHandler
Type Aliases.summary: The event handler when a day is focused.

Type Aliases.name: DayKeyboardEventHandler
Type Aliases.summary: The event handler when a day gets a keyboard event.

Type Aliases.name: DayLabel
Type Aliases.summary: Return the ARIA label for the [Day](/api/main/functions/Day.md) component.

Type Aliases.name: DayModifiers
Type Aliases.summary: The custom modifiers passed to the [DayPickerBase.modifiers](/api/main/interfaces/DayPickerBase.md#modifiers).

Type Aliases.name: DayMouseEventHandler
Type Aliases.summary: The event handler when a day gets a mouse event.

Type Aliases.name: DayOfWeek
Type Aliases.summary: A matcher to match a date being one of the specified days of the week (`0-6`, where `0` is Sunday).

Type Aliases.name: DayPointerEventHandler
Type Aliases.summary: The event handler when a day gets a pointer event.

Type Aliases.name: DaySelectionMode
Type Aliases.summary:
Selection modes supported by DayPicker.

- `single`: use DayPicker to select single days.
- `multiple`: allow selecting multiple days.
- `range`: use DayPicker to select a range of days
- `default`: disable the built-in selection behavior. Customize what is
  selected by using [DayPickerBase.onDayClick](/api/main/interfaces/DayPickerBase.md#ondayclick).

Type Aliases.name: DayTouchEventHandler
Type Aliases.summary: The event handler when a day gets a touch event.

Type Aliases.name: FocusContextValue
Type Aliases.summary: Represents the value of the [FocusContext](/api/main/variables/FocusContext.md).

Type Aliases.name: Formatters
Type Aliases.summary: Represent a map of formatters used to render localized content.

Type Aliases.name: InputDayPickerProps
Type Aliases.summary: The props to attach to the DayPicker component when using [useInput](/api/main/functions/useInput.md).

Type Aliases.name: InputProps
Type Aliases.summary: The props to attach to the input field when using [useInput](/api/main/functions/useInput.md).

Type Aliases.name: InternalModifiers
Type Aliases.summary: Map of matchers used for the internal modifiers.

Type Aliases.name: InternalModifiersElement
Type Aliases.summary: These elements must not be in the `styles` or `classNames` records as they are styled via the `modifiersStyles` or `modifiersClassNames` pop

Type Aliases.name: Labels
Type Aliases.summary: Map of functions to translate ARIA labels for the relative elements.

Type Aliases.name: Matcher
Modifier
Type Aliases.summary: A _modifier_ represents different styles or states of a day displayed in the calendar.

Type Aliases.name: Modifiers
Type Aliases.summary: The modifiers used by DayPicker.

Type Aliases.name: ModifiersClassNames
Type Aliases.summary: The classnames to assign to each day element matching a modifier.

Type Aliases.name: ModifiersStyles
Type Aliases.summary: The style to apply to each day element matching a modifier.

Type Aliases.name: MonthChangeEventHandler
Type Aliases.summary: The event handler when a month is changed in the calendar.

Type Aliases.name: MonthsProps
Type Aliases.summary: The props for the [Months](/api/main/functions/Months.md) component.

Type Aliases.name: NavButtonLabel
Type Aliases.summary: Return the ARIA label for the "next month" / "prev month" buttons in the navigation.

Type Aliases.name: SelectMultipleEventHandler
Type Aliases.summary: The event handler when selecting multiple days.

Type Aliases.name: SelectMultipleModifiers
Type Aliases.summary: Represent the modifiers that are changed by the multiple selection.

Type Aliases.name: SelectRangeEventHandler
Type Aliases.summary: The event handler when selecting a range of days.

Type Aliases.name: SelectRangeModifiers
Type Aliases.summary: Represent the modifiers that are changed by the range selection.

Type Aliases.name: SelectSingleEventHandler
Type Aliases.summary: The event handler when selecting a single day.

Type Aliases.name: StyledComponent
Type Aliases.summary: Props of a component that can be styled via classNames or inline-styles.

Type Aliases.name: StyledElement
Type Aliases.summary: The style (either via class names or via in-line styles) of an element.

Type Aliases.name: Styles
Type Aliases.summary:
The inline-styles of each styled element, to use with the `styles` prop. Day
modifiers, such as `today` or `hidden`, should be styled using the
`modifiersStyles` prop.

Type Aliases.name: WeekNumberClickEventHandler
Type Aliases.summary: The event handler when the week number is clicked.

Type Aliases.name: WeekNumberFormatter
Type Aliases.summary: Represent a function to format the week number.

Type Aliases.name: WeekNumberLabel
Type Aliases.summary: Return the ARIA label of the week number.

Type Aliases.name: WeekdayLabel
Type Aliases.summary: Return the ARIA label for the Head component.

Variables.name: DayPickerContext
Variables.summary:
The DayPicker context shares the props passed to DayPicker within internal
and custom components. It is used to set the default values and perform
one-time calculations required to render the days.

Access to this context from the [useDayPicker](/api/main/functions/useDayPicker.md) hook.

Variables.name: FocusContext
Variables.summary:
The Focus context shares details about the focused day for the keyboard

Access this context from the [useFocusContext](/api/main/functions/useFocusContext.md) hook.

Variables.name: NavigationContext
Variables.summary:
The Navigation context shares details and methods to navigate the months in DayPicker.
Access this context from the [useNavigation](/api/main/functions/useNavigation.md) hook.

Variables.name: SelectMultipleContext
Variables.summary:
The SelectMultiple context shares details about the selected days when in
multiple selection mode.

Access this context from the [useSelectMultiple](/api/main/functions/useSelectMultiple.md) hook.

Variables.name: SelectRangeContext
Variables.summary:
The SelectRange context shares details about the selected days when in
range selection mode.

Access this context from the [useSelectRange](/api/main/functions/useSelectRange.md) hook.

Variables.name: SelectSingleContext
Variables.summary:
The SelectSingle context shares details about the selected days when in
single selection mode.

Access this context from the [useSelectSingle](/api/main/functions/useSelectSingle.md) hook.

Functions.name: Button
Functions.summary: Render a button HTML element applying the reset class name.

Functions.name: Caption
Functions.summary:
Render the caption of a month. The caption has a different layout when
setting the [DayPickerBase.captionLayout](/api/main/interfaces/DayPickerBase.md#captionlayout) prop.

Functions.name: CaptionDropdowns
Functions.summary: Render a caption with the dropdowns to navigate between months and years.

Functions.name: CaptionLabel
Functions.summary: Render the caption for the displayed month. This component is used when `captionLayout="buttons"`.

Functions.name: CaptionNavigation
Functions.summary: Render a caption with a button-based navigation.

Functions.name: Day
Functions.summary:
The content of a day cell – as a button or span element according to its
modifiers.

Functions.name: DayContent
Functions.summary: Render the content of the day cell.

Functions.name: DayPicker
Functions.summary:
DayPicker render a date picker component to let users pick dates from a
calendar. See http://react-day-picker.js.org for updated documentation and
examples.

### Customization

DayPicker offers different customization props. For example,

- show multiple months using `numberOfMonths`
- display a dropdown to navigate the months via `captionLayout`
- display the week numbers with `showWeekNumbers`
- disable or hide days with `disabled` or `hidden`

### Controlling the months

Change the initially displayed month using the `defaultMonth` prop. The
displayed months are controlled by DayPicker and stored in its internal
state. To control the months yourself, use `month` instead of `defaultMonth`
and use the `onMonthChange` event to set it.

To limit the months the user can navigate to, use
`fromDate`/`fromMonth`/`fromYear` or `toDate`/`toMonth`/`toYear`.

### Selection modes

DayPicker supports different selection mode that can be toggled using the
`mode` prop:

- `mode="single"`: only one day can be selected. Use `required` to make the
  selection required. Use the `onSelect` event handler to get the selected
  days.
- `mode="multiple"`: users can select one or more days. Limit the amount of
  days that can be selected with the `min` or the `max` props.
- `mode="range"`: users can select a range of days. Limit the amount of days
  in the range with the `min` or the `max` props.
- `mode="default"` (default): the built-in selections are disabled. Implement
  your own selection mode with `onDayClick`.

The selection modes should cover the most common use cases. In case you
need a more refined way of selecting days, use `mode="default"`. Use the
`selected` props and add the day event handlers to add/remove days from the
selection.

### Modifiers

A _modifier_ represents different styles or states for the days displayed in
the calendar (like "selected" or "disabled"). Define custom modifiers using
the `modifiers` prop.

### Formatters and custom component

You can customize how the content is displayed in the date picker by using
either the formatters or replacing the internal components.

For the most common cases you want to use the `formatters` prop to change how
the content is formatted in the calendar. Use the `components` prop to
replace the internal components, like the navigation icons.

### Styling

DayPicker comes with a default, basic style in `react-day-picker/style` – use
it as template for your own style.

If you are using CSS modules, pass the imported styles object the
`classNames` props.

You can also style the elements via inline styles using the `styles` prop.

### Form fields

If you need to bind the date picker to a form field, you can use the
`useInput` hooks for a basic behavior. See the `useInput` source as an
example to bind the date picker with form fields.

### Localization

To localize DayPicker, import the locale from `date-fns` package and use the
`locale` prop.

For example, to use Spanish locale:

```
import { es } from 'date-fns/locale';
<DayPicker locale={es} />
```

Functions.name: DayPickerProvider
Functions.summary:
The provider for the [DayPickerContext](/api/main/variables/DayPickerContext.md), assigning the defaults from the
initial DayPicker props.

Functions.name: Dropdown
Functions.summary:
Render a styled select component – displaying a caption and a custom
drop-down icon.

Functions.name: FocusProvider
Functions.summary: The provider for the [FocusContext](/api/main/variables/FocusContext.md).

Functions.name: Footer
Functions.summary: Render the Footer component (empty as default).

Functions.name: Head
Functions.summary: Render the table head.

Functions.name: HeadRow
Functions.summary: Render the HeadRow component - i.e. the table head row with the weekday names.

Functions.name: IconDropdown
Functions.summary: Render the icon in the styled drop-down.

Functions.name: IconLeft
Functions.summary: Render the "previous month" button in the navigation.

Functions.name: IconRight
Functions.summary: Render the "next month" button in the navigation.

Functions.name: Months
Functions.summary: Render the wrapper for the month grids.

Functions.name: NavigationProvider
Functions.summary: Provides the values for the [NavigationContext](/api/main/variables/NavigationContext.md).

Functions.name: RootProvider
Functions.summary: Provide the value for all the context providers.

Functions.name: Row
Functions.summary: Render a row in the calendar, with the days and the week number.

Functions.name: SelectMultipleProvider
Functions.summary: Provides the values for the [SelectMultipleContext](/api/main/variables/SelectMultipleContext.md).

Functions.name: SelectRangeProvider
Functions.summary: Provides the values for the [SelectRangeProvider](/api/main/functions/SelectRangeProvider.md).

Functions.name: SelectSingleProvider
Functions.summary: Provides the values for the [SelectSingleProvider](/api/main/functions/SelectSingleProvider.md).

Functions.name: WeekNumber
Functions.summary:
Render the week number element. If `onWeekNumberClick` is passed to DayPicker, it
renders a button, otherwise a span element.

Functions.name: addToRange
Functions.summary:
Add a day to an existing range.

The returned range takes in account the `undefined` values and if the added
day is already present in the range.

Functions.name: isDateAfterType
Functions.summary: Returns true if `value` is of type [DateAfter](/api/main/type-aliases/DateAfter.md).

Functions.name: isDateBeforeType
Functions.summary: Returns true if `value` is of type [DateBefore](/api/main/type-aliases/DateBefore.md).

Functions.name: isDateInterval
Functions.summary: Returns true if `matcher` is of type [DateInterval](/api/main/type-aliases/DateInterval.md).

Functions.name: isDateRange
Functions.summary: Returns true if `value` is a [DateRange](/api/main/type-aliases/DateRange.md) type.

Functions.name: isDayOfWeekType
Functions.summary: Returns true if `value` is a [DayOfWeek](/api/main/type-aliases/DayOfWeek.md) type.

Functions.name: isDayPickerDefault
Functions.summary: Returns true when the props are of type [DayPickerDefaultProps](/api/main/interfaces/DayPickerDefaultProps.md).

Functions.name: isDayPickerMultiple
Functions.summary: Returns true when the props are of type [DayPickerMultipleProps](/api/main/interfaces/DayPickerMultipleProps.md).

Functions.name: isDayPickerRange
Functions.summary: Returns true when the props are of type [DayPickerRangeProps](/api/main/interfaces/DayPickerRangeProps.md).

Functions.name: isDayPickerSingle
Functions.summary: Returns true when the props are of type [DayPickerSingleProps](/api/main/interfaces/DayPickerSingleProps.md).

Functions.name: isMatch
useActiveModifiers
Functions.summary:
Return the active modifiers for the specified day.

This hook is meant to be used inside internal or custom components.

Functions.name: useDayPicker
Functions.summary:
Hook to access the [DayPickerContextValue](/api/main/interfaces/DayPickerContextValue.md).

Use the DayPicker context to access to the props passed to DayPicker inside
internal or custom components.

Functions.name: useDayRender
Functions.summary:
Return props and data used to render the [Day](/api/main/functions/Day.md) component.

Use this hook when creating a component to replace the built-in `Day`
component.

Functions.name: useFocusContext
Functions.summary:
Hook to access the [FocusContextValue](/api/main/type-aliases/FocusContextValue.md). Use this hook to handle the
focus state of the elements.

This hook is meant to be used inside internal or custom components.

Functions.name: useInput
Functions.summary: Return props and setters for binding an input field to DayPicker.

Functions.name: useNavigation
Functions.summary:
Hook to access the [NavigationContextValue](/api/main/interfaces/NavigationContextValue.md). Use this hook to navigate
between months or years in DayPicker.

This hook is meant to be used inside internal or custom components.

Functions.name: useSelectMultiple
Functions.summary:
Hook to access the [SelectMultipleContextValue](/api/main/interfaces/SelectMultipleContextValue.md).

This hook is meant to be used inside internal or custom components.

Functions.name: useSelectRange
Functions.summary:
Hook to access the [SelectRangeContextValue](/api/main/interfaces/SelectRangeContextValue.md).

This hook is meant to be used inside internal or custom components.

Functions.name: useSelectSingle
Functions.summary:
Hook to access the [SelectSingleContextValue](/api/main/interfaces/SelectSingleContextValue.md).

This hook is meant to be used inside internal or custom components.
